name: Master
description: Master This contract creates repeaters and make them perform some actions.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of repeaters to create.

functionDecorators.name: say
functionDecorators.description: Make repeaters from `_start` to `_end` (included) call `_target` with `_data`.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: The contract to be called by the repeaters.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The data the repeaters will send to the contract.

functionDecorators.name: sayWithValue
functionDecorators.description: Make repeaters from `_start` to `_end` (included) call `_target` with `_data` sending `_value` wei.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: The contract to be called by the repeaters.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The data the repeaters will send to the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of wei to send.
